features: Help alleviate back and hip pain: Sleepavo’s coccyx pillow has been ergonomically designed to help take pressure off of user’s lower back or tailbone and offers orthopedic tailbone pain relief while sitting. This cushion promotes healthy posture and proper spinal alignment.

Signature ergonomic shape with pressure-relieving cut out: The U-shaped design, with its cut-out center and contoured surface, removes pressure from the coccyx to ensure the tailbone hovers over the surface of the seat, thereby alleviating any discomfort caused by sitting for extended periods.

High density memory foam seat cushion: This coccyx cushion is made from a high-quality memory foam to offer comfort and to help relieve back pain, tailbone pain, and sciatica. This cushion can support up to 275 lbs., and is ideal for office chairs, wheelchairs, airplanes, or for use in a car. Great for short and long trips.

Includes washable cover, anti skid bottom and carrying handle: This pillow features a zippered, removable mesh cover that is completely machine washable to make cleaning easier. The case also features a non-slip, rubber bottom to ensure the cushion will stay firmly positioned in a seat, and a convenient handle for easy transport.

Use in the office or while traveling: Each coccyx pillow measures 18” x 14” x 3” and is great for travel. Each cushion comes with a full three-year warranty that protects against any damage or defects. If your pillow goes flat, send it back for a FREE replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive value for the price, with surprising benefit!
reviews.reviewText: In retirement I spend a lot of time on my porch rocker watching to world go by. The Wally World traditional tufted seat cushion served for a few years until I found a large variety of memory foam coccyx sculpted cushions being offered. This item is simply the cat's meow.First, very competitive pricing. Second, a full 3" tall providing ample cushion. Third, immediate relief and immediate improvement in posture just have a firm, sculpted throne upon which to settle my tailbone.Previous reviews have complained about the stiffness of the memory foam. It is a true memory foam, and why else buy one but to have firm support where needed? This comes with a zipper to remove the cover for washing, and my experience is cheap zippers will eventually disappoint, but not here! Clearly well made and durable. The pebbled bottom grip surface keeps the cushion where I place it in the rocker, I cannot "scootch" down to shift position - I have to stand up and adjust the placement. Where it stays where I put it. The traditional flat cushion would cover the entire surface of the rocker seat, and would uncomfortably press against the inside angle of my knees, cutting off circulation and making me shift position to relieve the tingle. Not this Plixio! It fully supports my bottom, and extends only to mid-thigh underneath me, so my knees are in the open air and not impeded in the slightest.Finally ... the cards and literature included show this is a small, friend run business in Tampa for the past ten years. The owner included a card with a direct (814) area code number to contact him directly for any product problem or question. It was a small delight to receive a photo of the entire staff wishing me well.GREAT find, which is harder to do on today's Amazon than it ought to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have bought other seat cushions for my office chair and they were too hard for me. I am 5' 4" and weight 120 lbs. I think the harder cushions are for someone that might weigh more. This cushion is perfect for me. It's soft yet supportive. It has really helped my back. I've struggled with a lot of back pain due to sitting 8 hours a day for work. It did take my body about a day to adjust to it... not sure why. It has brought me a lot of relief!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is small, but good
reviews.reviewText: This is very thick and comfortable. It fits my width but I wish the length was a wedged angle going closer towards my knee. Right now, it hits about halfway on my upper leg. But seems good quality for the price, just wouldn't recommend for people over 150lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Picture does not do it justice, I just received the cushion, and I can't believe how comfortable and sturdy it is. I have invested in so many similar cushions, and for the first time I can say I am loving the cushion. Thank You so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion is great. I ordered one for Christmas for my daughter and I had to have one for myself. I love the clear big instruction card too. Very nicely thought out product. Thank you and I love that it was designed in the USA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fixes main problem but less comfortable overall
reviews.reviewText: I sit a lot. My day job is computer programmer, and when I'm done with that, I write novels.This cushion is thick and cushy, as advertised, and the cutout does a good job eliminating tailbone pain.However, it's not perfect, and I don't think any of the competitors will be, either. In short, it's just not the right size. It seems to be designed for the smallest chair you're likely to put it on and not an average office chair. As I'm sitting on it right now, if I position it enough it's under my all the way at the back, then it's 3 or 4 inches too short towards the front. And it's about 2 inches too narrow.Furthermore, it doesn't tail off in a sort of waterfall design the way my chair does, so the support of my legs just stops suddenly rather than curving down. The end result is uncomfortable pressure partway down my legs. If I slouch around or move the cushion on the chair, it only moves where that point hits.For me the end result is:-A cure for tailbone pain-But otherwise not as comfortable as my (pretty decent) office chair is without the cushionIt might be a perfect fit for a smallish to average-sized woman or maybe even up to an average-sized man. But I'm 6-2 and broad.If they could fix these things, they'd get additional star for each:-Correct size-"curve off" at the legs to match the curve of the chair I'm sitting onI don't think any of the competitors will be any better. I have to decide if the no-tailbone-pain is worth the added discomfort otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Eased a lot of discomfort after surgery and lots of sitting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This cushion works!
reviews.reviewText: This cushion has finally has aloud me to sit comfortably for hours with out pain! Also yesterday I used it on a 7 hour drive without have pain or fidget. I have had it now for 2 weeks and love it!
I tried many brands but it is the best for this price, I recommend it.

Lo compré porque paso mucho tiempo sentada en el trabajo, recién tuve una operación de espalda y esta compra me ha ayudado mucho a que no me duela la herida; es súper cómodo sentarse en él, tiene buen tamaño y los materiales se sienten de buena calidad. Considero que fue una buena compra, siento que ayudo a mi cuerpo a no sufrir tanto al estar sentada.
I have tried other brand and this was the one I would recommend. Highly effective and provides relief immediately.

Buen producto, cómodo, aunque en mi opinión estaría mejor si fuera un poco más grande ya que ese tamaño es para gente muy delgada o niños, si eres de los que pasa horas sentado por trabajo o vicio y te mueves constantemente con malas poses (te sientas mal en ocasiones) el cojín se mueve y empieza lastimar los bordes teniendo que acomodarlo a cada rato, por eso sería mejor que esté más grande para evitar acomodarlo constantemente y sea mejor la comodidad
